00013 extern Resource *interruptsResource;

00020 void DigitalOutput::InitDigitalOutput(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00021 {
00022     m_channel = channel;
00023     m_pwmGenerator = ~0ul;
00024     m_module = DigitalModule::GetInstance(slot);
00025     m_module->AllocateDIO(m_channel, false);
00026 }
00027 
00032 DigitalOutput::DigitalOutput(UINT32 channel)
00033 {
00034     InitDigitalOutput(GetDefaultDigitalModule(), channel);
00035 }
00036 
00041 DigitalOutput::DigitalOutput(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00042 {
00043     InitDigitalOutput(slot, channel);
00044 }
00045 
00049 DigitalOutput::~DigitalOutput()
00050 {
00051     // Disable the PWM in case it was running.
00052     DisablePWM();
00053     m_module->FreeDIO(m_channel);
00054 }
00055 
00060 void DigitalOutput::Set(UINT32 value)
00061 {
00062     m_module->SetDIO(m_channel, value);
00063 }
00064 
00068 UINT32 DigitalOutput::GetChannel()
00069 {
00070     return m_channel;
00071 }
00072 
00079 void DigitalOutput::Pulse(float length)
00080 {
00081     m_module->Pulse(m_channel, length);
00082 }
00083 
00088 bool DigitalOutput::IsPulsing()
00089 {
00090     return m_module->IsPulsing(m_channel);
00091 }

00102 void DigitalOutput::SetPWMRate(float rate)
00103 {
00104     m_module->SetDO_PWMRate(rate);
00105 }
00106 
00119 void DigitalOutput::EnablePWM(float initialDutyCycle)
00120 {
00121     if (m_pwmGenerator != ~0ul) return;
00122     m_pwmGenerator = m_module->AllocateDO_PWM();
00123     m_module->SetDO_PWMDutyCycle(m_pwmGenerator, initialDutyCycle);
00124     m_module->SetDO_PWMOutputChannel(m_pwmGenerator, m_channel);
00125 }
00126 
00132 void DigitalOutput::DisablePWM()
00133 {
00134     // Disable the output by routing to a dead bit.
00135     m_module->SetDO_PWMOutputChannel(m_pwmGenerator, kDigitalChannels);
00136     m_module->FreeDO_PWM(m_pwmGenerator);
00137     m_pwmGenerator = ~0ul;
00138 }
00139 
00148 void DigitalOutput::UpdateDutyCycle(float dutyCycle)
00149 {
00150     m_module->SetDO_PWMDutyCycle(m_pwmGenerator, dutyCycle);
00151 }
00152 
00156 UINT32 DigitalOutput::GetChannelForRouting()
00157 {
00158     return DigitalModule::RemapDigitalChannel(GetChannel() - 1);
00159 }
00160 
00164 UINT32 DigitalOutput::GetModuleForRouting()
00165 {
00166     return DigitalModule::SlotToIndex(m_module->GetSlot());
00167 }
00168 
00172 bool DigitalOutput::GetAnalogTriggerForRouting()
00173 {
00174     return false;
00175 }
00176 
00185 void DigitalOutput::RequestInterrupts(tInterruptHandler handler, void *param)
00186 {
00187     m_interruptIndex = interruptsResource->Allocate();
00188 //TODO: check for error on allocation
00189 
00190     // Creates a manager too
00191     AllocateInterrupts(false);
00192 
00193     m_interrupt->writeConfig_WaitForAck(false, &status);
00194     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_AnalogTrigger(GetAnalogTriggerForRouting(), &status);
00195     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Channel(GetChannelForRouting(), &status);
00196     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Module(GetModuleForRouting(), &status);
00197     SetUpSourceEdge(true, false);
00198 
00199     m_manager->registerHandler(handler, param, &status);
00200     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00201 }
00202 
00209 void DigitalOutput::RequestInterrupts()
00210 {
00211     m_interruptIndex = interruptsResource->Allocate();
00212 //TODO: check for errors
00213 
00214     AllocateInterrupts(true);
00215 
00216     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_AnalogTrigger(GetAnalogTriggerForRouting(), &status);
00217     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Channel(GetChannelForRouting(), &status);
00218     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Module(GetModuleForRouting(), &status);
00219     SetUpSourceEdge(true, false);
00220     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00221 }
00222 
00223 void DigitalOutput::SetUpSourceEdge(bool risingEdge, bool fallingEdge)
00224 {
00225     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00226     if (m_interrupt != NULL)
00227     {
00228         m_interrupt->writeConfig_RisingEdge(risingEdge, &status);
00229         m_interrupt->writeConfig_FallingEdge(fallingEdge, &status);
00230     }
00231     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00232 }
